    • messagesToJson

      public static String messagesToJson(Project project, String... additionalTags)
      Print messages for given project into JSON. These messages are tagged by project description or tagged by any of the project's group name.
      Parameters:
      project - the project
      additionalTags - additional list of tags
      Returns:
      JSON string
